title: Hideo Kojima Plays Nintendo Switch - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Death Stranding and Metal Gear Creator Hideo Kojima took Greg on in a game of 1-2-Switch at RTX Sydney. 

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody? I'm Greg Miller and this is Hideo Kojima. We're about to do a Let's Play of 1-2-Switch, the shooting game or whatever, and I'm going to smoke you. You don't have a chance in hell. It's over, partner. All right, here you ready? I got him. That's Greg. Oh, let's see your stats. Let's see your stats, please. Please. Best, yeah, best of three. Best of three. Very. Give me a minute. All right. Oh, don't get ahead of yourself. It's going to be close. One. Woo! Bring me all your legendary game developers and I will crush them. Miyamoto, are you here? Ladies and gentlemen, what do you think of Hideo Kojima and 1-2-Switch? Let us know in the comments below. Share the video with your friends and until next time. No, it's been our pleasure to serve you. I'm sorry you had to die. You had to die. Bring me them all.
